description: Ambiguous: 4 commits referencing GitHub issue IDs where the open/closed status is unclear from commit messages alone. Model must handle uncertainty without fabricating resolution status.

commits.message: WIP on #42: partial fix for model loading race condition
Related to #42 and #57: add synchronization to model init path
Addresses #57: improve error message when model file not found
See #42 â€” still investigating intermittent deadlock on multi-core

summary.notes: Model must reference issues #42 and #57 but should NOT claim either is resolved. #42 is explicitly still open (WIP, still investigating). #57 status is ambiguous (addressed but not closed). Blockers should mention the ongoing deadlock investigation.

json.notes: All commits relate to bug fixing. Status for #42 commits should be in-progress or unknown. Status for #57 commit could be done or unknown.
